co.uk.niadel.mpi.util.translation

Class LangFileTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.util.translation.LangFileTranslator

  • public class LangFileTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to translate a .lang file assuming the standard Minecraft .lang format IE. item.string_id.name=Test Item
    Author:
    Niadel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String[] fileContents
      A String array containing the file's contents.
      java.lang.String fileName
      The name of the .lang file being read.

    • Method Detail

      • getTranslation

        public java.lang.String getTranslation(java.lang.String unlocalisedName)
        Gets a translation from the lang file contents.
        Parameters:
        unlocalisedName - The unlocalised name for the translation, like block.amazingBlock.name.
        Returns:
        The localised name, if using above example is used, this is "Amazing Block".
